text: HOW TO SECURE YOUR RAW DOG VPS SERVER - Disable password auth, use only key-based auth (both Hetzner and Digital Ocean do this by default usually) - Install fail2ban on SSH - Enable unattended-upgrades with auto reboot - Enable firewall in Hetzner/Digital Ocean dashboard and
We're teaming up with HKU to open source OpenCUA, the first full framework for computer-use agents.
author: Kimi.ai

text: The FT says that the Chinese podcast scene is booming. Are there any services that make it easy to translate podcasts, building on all of the recent advances in machine translation, voice cloning, etc.? Or, better yet, are there podcast apps with a language selector?

text: If my follower count went to zero, here's how I'd start building up audience on X again. 1) Get crystal clear on who you're creating for • my ICP = early stage founders 2) Find 25 people who are beloved by your ICP • scroll your feed until you find a high engagement post

text: You spot an unsigned band destined to break out. Instead of cold-calling labels, what if you could bet on them yourself? Introducing opportunity markets: private prediction markets where those who find opportunities get paid by those who act on them. w/ @no__________end 1/
